DIA_Badulf_FirstWarn_03_01: Stop! No one is allowed to go down into the basement of the monastery without permission!
DIA_Badulf_Why_03_02: This is a direct order from the Prior. Only Archmages are allowed in.
DIA_Badulf_What_03_02: Behind my back are the catacombs of the monastery. Nothing to interest you, young man.
DIA_Badulf_Angry_03_01: Don't think I don't know about your little visit to the catacombs.
DIA_Badulf_Angry_03_02: You're lucky nothing of value is missing from there, or Notger himself would have had a go at your skin.
DIA_Badulf_Pass_15_01: Aren't you guarding the entrance to the catacombs?
DIA_Badulf_Pass_03_02: At this point, another mage is guarding the door. I think it's obvious that we need to take turns from time to time.
DIA_Badulf_Pass_03_03: Standing in that underground may be a great way to meditate, but everyone needs to get some fresh air from time to time.
DIA_Badulf_Potion_15_01: Could I get some healing potions from you?
DIA_Badulf_Potion_03_02: You don't look sick to me, but so be it. Take this potion.
DIA_Badulf_Potion_03_03: But you'll have to pay for the next one. Our monastery needs funds to help the penniless.
DIA_Badulf_Ambient_03_01: I'm trying to meditate. Don't bother me!
DIA_Badulf_Ambient_03_02: I already told you, I can't let you pass.
DIA_Badulf_Ambient_03_03: If you're hoping to get me off balance, you're wrong.
